snippet: Roger Cohen, columnist for The New York Times and the International Herald Tribune, moderated a panel titled: "The Arab Spring: Window of opportunity or disaster for women?" from the Trust Women Conference in London on Tuesday, Dec. 3.
abstract: Roger Cohen, columnist for The New York Times and the International Herald Tribune, moderated a panel titled: "The Arab Spring: Window of opportunity or disaster for women?" from the Trust Women Conference in London on Tuesday, Dec. 3.

headline.main: Trust Women Conference: Women and the Arab Spring
